content: /=As you make your way to the door, you turn to look at Iver.=/
/=Before Iver can respond, Oddleif abruptly enters the room.=/
[$hero] "He looks as bad as me."
[$hero] "I never want him doing something like that again."
[$hero] "Let them. Everyone makes their own choice to follow us or not."
[$hero] "Out of everyone."
[$hero] "So why even follow me? I get people killed."
[$hero] "Where's Juno? I figured she'd be by Eyvind's side."
/=Impressive as his strength may be, you notice how the use of power taxed the mender. He looks...older.=/
[iver] "Besides, Bolverk's a rabid dog best kept away from clansmen."
[iver $hero] "Another varl isn't going to help that situation. I'll stay here with the mender."
[iver $hero] "Go. The people should see you handle something like this without me around."
[iver $hero] "I'll let /=you =/tell that to the man who can pull lightning from the sky and lift rocks to form bridges."
[iver $hero] "I'm not doing this again. If you can't see the number of people out there still alive because of you, nothing I say will change it."
[iver $hero] "It took a lot out of him."
[iver $hero] "It took a lot out of him."
[iver $hero] "No doubt. A lot of families lost members out there."
[iver] "If they've made up their minds to go, they'll leave whenever you're not looking."
/=Iver stands stoically by Eyvind's pallet, watching the mender's breathing.=/
/= Iver stands stoically by Eyvind's pallet, watching the unconscious mender's breathing.=/
[iver] "Maybe, but then what? Do you plan on tying up all the Ravens and dragging them to Arberrang?"
/=Just as Iver shrugs, Oddleif abruptly enters the room.=/
[oddleif] "And the Ravens have been hoarding supplies this whole time and they're trying to take off with them."
[oddleif] "But the Ravens have been hoarding supplies this whole time and they're trying to take off with them."
[oddleif] "Good, you're here. It's the Ravens - they're trying to leave and some of our people want to go with them."
[oddleif $hero] "Good, you're here. It's the Ravens - they're trying to leave and some of our people want to go with them."
[oddleif] "I know, but they've been hoarding supplies this whole time and they're trying to take off with them!"
[oddleif] "I'm not saying any of that is your fault, but people are scared."
[oddleif] "Juno and Hakon are trying to talk sense to Bolverk, so it's desperate."
[oddleif] "We nearly went over a waterfall in ships and lost a lot of people following some Valka across floating rocks."
{skip} mark1=$hero mark2=oddleif mark3=iver
/=With nothing to say, you look down at the resting mender. The spellweaving took a toll on him. =/
